sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Update newly introduced sys_class_name field value for all records to support striped TeamSpace entities for the following tables: project_template, project_template_task, pm_portfolio_project, pm_portfolio_goal, pm_portfolio_risk, pm_portfolio_issue.</description> <name>Update sys_class_name for PPS tables</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var pmUpgradeHelper = new PMTeamspaceUpgradeHelper(); pmUpgradeHelper.upgrade();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-02-22 11:00:52</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ca0e2520473112002f4a7eaecb9a71f6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Update sys_class_name for PPS tables</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Project Management" source="com.snc.project_management_v3">9eef82e747e64210cd4e1ce4316d43e3</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_ca0e2520473112002f4a7eaecb9a71f6</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-03-02 09:02:31</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
